DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate safety tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics single oral dos PF-06291874 healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose Study Of PF-06291874 In Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose trial evaluate safety tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics single oral dos PF-06291874 healthy volunteer . The trial terminate Jan 9 , 2012 , due undesired pharmacokinetic property . The decision terminate trial base safety efficacy concern .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject non childbearing potential . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include clinically significant drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) .
DOC.keyword: Single Ascending Dose Study healthy subject
